Module cs230
Package cs230.viewController

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
cs230.viewController.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MainMenuController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
Author:
Dafydd-Rhys Maund, Oliver
